src:
Prediksi Liga 1: Borneo FC vs Badak Lampung FC
04 Nov 2019, 07:26 by Tempo.co, Rina Widiastuti
TEMPO.CO, Jakarta - Borneo FC bertekad meraih kemenangan saat menjamu Barito Putera pada pekan ke-2 Liga 1 2019 di Stadion Segiri, Selasa malam. Kemenangan kandang tersebut akan mengobati luka atas kekalahan sebelumnya di markas Barito Putra 1-0 pada Kamis pekan lalu.
Tim Pesut Etam yang kini menduduki peringkat keempat klasemen sementara Liga 1 secara statistik lebih diunggulkan dibanding dengan Badak Lampung yang berada di urutan ke-15 klasemen.
Dalam lima laga terakhir, Borneo mencatat dua kemenangan kandang, dua seri, dan sekali kalah tandang. Kemenangan kandang terbesar saat melibas Bali United 6-0 pada 18 Oktober lalu.
Sementara, Badak Lampung FC tercatat dua kali kalah di kandang, dua lali kalah tandang, dan sekali menang di kandang. Kemenangan kandang terakhir saat menjamu Arema FC pada Jumat pekan lalu, dengan skor 4-3.
Bek kanan Borneo FC, Makarius Suruan, memprediksi pertandingan melawan Badak Lampung bakal berlangsung berat. Menurut Makarius, kemenangan tim asuhan Milan Petrovic atas Arema di laga terakhir menjadi bukti tim lawan wajib diwaspadai.
"Badak Lampung saat ini tidak bisa kita anggap remeh. Mereka sekarang dalam trek yang cukup bagus. Semangat meeka untuk lepas dari zona degradasi jadi hal yang lebih yang mereka miliki," ujar Makarius.
Kedatangan beberapa pemain anyar, terutama pemain asing menjadi salah satu hal yang membuat Badak Lampung lebih tangguh. Fransisco Wagsley, Fernandinho, Marquinhos Carioca adalah deretan pemain anyar Badak Lampung. Selain itu, ada mantan bek Persib Bandung, Bojan Malisic.
"Mereka kuat di belakang, ada dua bek asing itu dan lini depannya ada pemain asing yang juga mencetak gol ke gawang kami di pertandingan putaran pertama. Yang jelas kami sama sekali tak meremehkan Badak Lampung di pertandingan nanti," ujarnya.
Dikatakan Makarius, meski mengalami kekalahan di pertandingan terakhir namun ia yakin semua pemain sudah melupakan hasil tersebut. Kini mereka fokus untuk bangkit kembali dan meneruskan catatan apik bersama Borneo FC.
"Kami lagi butuh penawar setelah laga terakhir kalah. Jadi kami harus kerja sangat keras untuk bisa memenangkan pertandingan, agar kami bisa terus bersaing di papan atas," ujarnya.
Menjelang laga melawan Badak Lampung, dua pemain inti yang sebelumnya absen dipastikan bisa tampil, yaitu Matias Conti dan Abdul Rahman. Sebelumnya kedua pemain itu harus menepi pasca-jeda internasional bulan lalu karena cedera.
Pelatih Badak Lampung FC, Milan Petrovic, bertekad mengoptimalkan delapan laga tersisa untuk mendongkrak timnya menjauh dari zona degradasi. "Untuk ke depannya ada waktu 15 hari, kami akan melakukan TC persiapan menghadapi delapan pertandingan berikutnya. Semoga dengan jumlah pertandingan yang tersisa, posisi Badak Lampung bisa terus naik di tabel klasemen," kata Milan.
Pertandingan terakhir Borneo FC31 Oktober 2019: Barito Putera vs Borneo FC 1-026 Oktober 2019: PSIS Semarang vs Borneo FC 2-222 Oktober 2019: Borneo FC vs Kalteng Putra 2-018 Oktober 2019: Bornoe FC vs Bali United 6-011 Oktober 2019 Persebaya vs Borneo FC 0-0
Pertandingan terakhir Badak Lampung FC1 November 2019: Badak Lampung vs Arema FC 4-328 Oktober 2019: Badak Lampung vs Persipura Jayapura 0-122 Oktober 2019: Bali United vs Badak Lampung FC 3-018 Oktober 2019: Barito Putera vs Badak Lampung 4-15 Oktober 2019: Badak Lampung vs Semen Padang 0-1
Head to head:22 Juli 2019: Badak Lampung vs Borneo FC 1-117 November 2018: Badak Lampung vs Borneo FC 3-17 Juli 2019: Borneo FC vs Badak Lampung 5-14 November 2017: Badak Lampung vs Borneo FC 3-222 Juli 2017: Borneo FC vs Badak Lampung FC 2-0
Prediksi:Berdasarkan data statistik kedua tim, Borneo FC mempunyai peluang lebih besar untuk memenangi pertandingan pekan ke-25 ini. Namun Badak Lampung juga tidak bisa dianggap remeh. Meski berstatus tim tamu, Badak Lampung akan memberikan perlawanan berat bagi Bornoe.

BORNEO FC | BADAK LAMPUNG FC | LIGA INDONESIA
text:
League 1 Prediction: Borneo FC vs Lampung FC Rhinos
04 Nov 2019, 07:26 by Tempo.co, Rina Widiastuti
TEMPO.CO, Jakarta - Borneo FC is determined to win when it entertains Barito Putera in the second week of League 1 2019 at Segiri Stadium on Tuesday night. The home win will treat injuries from a previous defeat at Barito Putra 1-0 on Thursday last week.
The Pesut Etam team, which is now ranked fourth in the League 1 standings, are statistically more favored than the Lampung Rhinos, which are ranked 15th in the standings.
In the last five matches, Borneo recorded two home wins, two draws and one defeat away. The biggest home victory when bulldoze Bali United 6-0 on 18 October.
Meanwhile, Lampung FC's Rhino recorded two defeats at home, two lost away, and one win at home. Last home win at home to Arema FC on Friday last week, with a score of 4-3.
Borneo FC right-back, Makarius Suruan, predicts the match against Lampung Rhinos will be tough. According to Makarius, the victory of Milan Petrovic's team over Arema in the last match is evidence that the opposing team must be aware of.
"Lampung rhino can not be underestimated at the moment. They are now on a pretty good track. Their enthusiasm to escape from the degradation zone is something more that they have," Makarius said.
The arrival of several newer players, especially foreign players, is one of the things that makes Lampung rhino more resilient. Fransisco Wagsley, Fernandinho, Marquinhos Carioca are a row of Lampung rhino players. In addition, there is a former Persib Bandung defender, Bojan Malisic.
"They are strong at the back, there are two foreign defenders and in the front line there are foreign players who also scored against our goal in the first round match. What is clear is we absolutely do not underestimate the Rhinos of Lampung in the match later," he said.
Makarius said, despite losing the last match but he was sure all the players had forgotten the results. Now they focus on getting back up and continuing their neat notes with Borneo FC.
"We again need the bidder after the last game lost. So we have to work very hard to be able to win the match, so we can continue to compete at the top," he said.
Ahead of the match against the Lampung Rhinos, two core players who were previously absent were certain to perform, namely Matias Conti and Abdul Rahman. Previously the two players had to pull over after the international break last month because of injury.
Lampung FC's Rhinoceros coach, Milan Petrovic, is determined to optimize the remaining eight matches to push his team away from the relegation zone. "In the future there will be 15 days, we will do TC preparations to face the next eight matches. Hopefully with the remaining number of matches, the position of Lampung Rhinos can continue to rise in the table," Milan said.
The last match of Borneo FC31 October 2019: Barito Putera vs Borneo FC 1-026 October 2019: PSIS Semarang vs Borneo FC 2-222 October 2019: Borneo FC vs Kalteng Putra 2-018 October 2019: Bornoe FC vs Bali United 6-011 October 2019 Persebaya vs Borneo FC 0-0
The last match of the Lampung Rhinos FC1 November 2019: Lampung Rhinos vs. Arema FC 4-328 October 2019: Lampung Rhinos vs Jayapura Persipura 0-122 October 2019: Bali United vs Lampung Rhinos FC 3-018 October 2019: Barito Putera vs Lampung Rhinos October 2019: Lampung vs Rhinos in Padang Rhinos 0-1
Head to head: July 22, 2019: Lampung vs Borneo FC Rhinoceros 1-117 November 2018: Lampung vs Borneo FC Rhinos July 3-17 2019: Borneo FC vs Lampung Rhinos November 5-14 2017: Lampung vs Borneo FC Rhinos July 3-222 2017: Borneo FC vs Badak Lampung FC 2-0
Prediction: Based on statistical data from both teams, Borneo FC has a greater chance to win this 25th week of matches. But the Lampung Rhinos also cannot be underestimated. Despite the status of the visitors, the Rhinos in Lampung will provide heavy resistance to Bornoe.

BORNEO FC | BADAK LAMPUNG FC | INDONESIA LIGA
